title: Pool Party Rek'sai recall bug
body: The final part of {{champion:421}} 's new skin's recall animation glitches occasionally, making {{champion:421}}  motionless underground instead of gobbling up the frog like he's supposed to.

replies.body: Pool Party Rek'sai also has some costume problems sometimes while she walks her snorkle (the mouth piece) swings out like a tongue
Thanks for the report - we'll take a look into this. I believe this may be something that's also occurring on Eternum as well.

Hiya XxsirderpsalotxX, 

This was an issue in patch 5.12, and should be resolved for patch 5.13.
His recall animation glitched during one of TheOddOne's stream too; a viewer said it only works if he's recalling when he's unburrowed.
ive actually never seen him eat the frog mine glitches eevery single time
